thread.title: Senator Rand Paul on Obama New Hostage Policy: “Really Stupid!”
thread.title_full: Senator Rand Paul on Obama New Hostage Policy: “Really Stupid!”

author: John Gibson Show
title: Senator Rand Paul on Obama New Hostage Policy: “Really Stupid!”
text:
John Gibson Jun 24, 2015 
President Obama on Wednesday rolled out new policies that would allow families of American hostages to communicate with their captors and offer ransom payments without the threat of prosecution. 
The new policy still prevents the U.S. from making concessions and ransom payments to hostage-takers. But it will allow families and government officials to communicate with terrorist groups or other third parties to help secure the release of hostages held overseas. 
Senator Rand Paul (R-KY) told John Gibson that all around this was a DUMB law to prevent you from paying ransom BUT it’s also STUPID for President Obama to announce that families can now pay.
